WEBTECHOPS LLP, ranukumbolo lab, FBianchi, Hanbai, gravisio, Future 365, Thomas Deckert, Jino

tspan.tspan: These are our core values: (which are all very basic

text.style: font-weight:300;font-size:6.35px;line-height:1.25;font-family:'Alibaba PuHuiTi';-inkscape-font-specification:'Alibaba PuHuiTi, Light';letter-spacing:0px;word-spacing:0px;white-space:pre;inline-size:162.472;display:inline;stroke-width:0.264583

tspan.tspan: [ These values are often associated with American idealism but
they are eroded in practice. For example, China is paying
Facebook to censor contents that are unfavorable to the
230 of the US Communications Decency Act grants
censor contents with immunity from civil
change any time soon. In the meantime,
particularly in what are formerly called
would be run adhering to these principles, not just
The reputation earned from "likes" translates to
in this community. The reputations can
be used to launch sub-communities for political

text.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:300;font-stretch:normal;font-size:18.6667px;line-height:1.25;font-family:'Alibaba PuHuiTi';-inkscape-font-specification:'Alibaba PuHuiTi, Light';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-position:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-alternates:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal;font-feature-settings:normal;font-variation-settings:normal;text-indent:0;text-align:start;text-decoration-line:none;text-decoration-style:solid;text-decoration-color:#000000;letter-spacing:0px;word-spacing:0px;text-transform:none;writing-mode:lr-tb;direction:ltr;text-orientation:mixed;dominant-baseline:auto;baseline-shift:baseline;text-anchor:start;white-space:pre;shape-padding:0;shape-margin:0;inline-size:518.442;opacity:1;vector-effect:none;fill:#000000;fill-opacity:1;stroke-width:0.999999;stroke-linecap:butt;stroke-linejoin:miter;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-dasharray:none;stroke-dashoffset:0;stroke-opacity:1;-inkscape-stroke:none;stop-color:#000000;stop-opacity:1
text.tspan: 民主并不一定公平，但怎样才公平？
民主是一种决策的方式，但它不一定公平
只有“自由竞争”才是合理的
民主的公平性：民主本来可以是公平的
我们假设民主涌现 meritocracy
但历史制造了不公平，有些人坚持历史正义
但“历史正义”并不等于绝对平等
A）「换了是你也一样」= 当时的道德标准
地理决定某个群体的 dominance
群体之间开始争斗，带来战争伤亡
很难判断 谁是谁非
B）非正义遗留下来的不平等是否那么大？
但这条问题的答案明显是“yes”
而这妨碍了 meritocracy 和 民主
C）历史正义 是可以补偿的

text.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:300;font-stretch:normal;font-size:18.6667px;line-height:1.25;font-family:'Alibaba PuHuiTi';-inkscape-font-specification:'Alibaba PuHuiTi, Light';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-position:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-alternates:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal;font-feature-settings:normal;font-variation-settings:normal;text-indent:0;text-align:start;text-decoration-line:none;text-decoration-style:solid;text-decoration-color:#000000;letter-spacing:0px;word-spacing:0px;text-transform:none;writing-mode:lr-tb;direction:ltr;text-orientation:mixed;dominant-baseline:auto;baseline-shift:baseline;text-anchor:start;white-space:pre;shape-padding:0;shape-margin:0;inline-size:439.237;opacity:1;vector-effect:none;fill:#000000;fill-opacity:1;stroke-width:0.999999;stroke-linecap:butt;stroke-linejoin:miter;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-dasharray:none;stroke-dashoffset:0;stroke-opacity:1;-inkscape-stroke:none;stop-color:#000000;stop-opacity:1
text.tspan: 换句话说，历史上存在的不平等与不正义
干扰了民主和才能主义合作的可能
但合作又是赚钱的先决条件
举例来说，故意造成饥荒、破坏教育机构
影响了某个地区人民的平均才能
故此 才能主义并不公平，除非作出历史补偿
才能主义、公平竞争是没有历史之下的合作原则
但在历史的扰乱下，必需找出合作的方案
在历史扰乱下，群众有各自的历史正义
所以在我们组织里面，似乎有必要算出历史正义
